title: Security for humans, not just machines – a fireside chat about security online
description: It's tempting to think about information security in terms of technology; we're constantly reminded of this since "cybersecurity" is all the rage in today's headlines. But security is really about the person using the technology.
extendedDescription: At the same time, technology is necessary to help us scale security to protect as many people as possible, across language and cultural and geographical boundaries, all over the world. Please join us in a wide-ranging conversation about security, trust, and the internet, and the importance of human-centric outcomes.
